All right, that's enough.  And while Cardhead had the right idea in not being 
critical while still reprimanding Kyle it seems to have unleashed a torrent 
of annoyances for me.  I really have to thank all of you who responded so 
favorably for your confidence in my being able to take care of this.  (for 
those of you too dense to notice that was sarcastic).

Now then, Kyle has agreed, whether he knows it or not, to no longer send any 
strictly Christian messages.  I can't complain if he promotes general 
religiousness but I will not stand for any one religion being promoted over 
the boards.  ZERO TOLERANCE!  There will be no more warnings.  New members 
will receive one warning, anyone here to receive this notice has already 
received their warning.  Anything REMOTELY resembling the promotion of one 
religion will result in IMMEDIATE banning.

On a related note ANY public responses to this message will result in 
moderation of a duration of undetermined length.  This includes supportive 
responses, I'm sorry but I need to try and be fair.

Also, anyone found being disrespectful toward fellow members will face severe 
punishment.  I'm tired of this nonsense and IT WILL STOP NOW.

I'm glad we've had this little monologue.  Now go use the board for what it's 
meant for.

--part1_42.343f50e8.2b6757fc_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
